00002  *
00003  * Permission to use, copy, modify, distribute, and sell this software and its
00004  * documentation for any purpose is hereby granted without fee, provided that
00005  * the above copyright notice appear in all copies and that both that

00012  *
00013  *  The T87 long Magnetic field model. See following reference (note: there are some errors in the
00014  *  paper);
00015  *
00016  *  Tsyganenko, N. A., Global quantitative models of the geomagnetic field
00017  *     in the cislunar magnetosphere for different disturbance levels,
00018  *     Planet. Space Sci., 35, 1347-1358, 1987.
00019  *
00020  *
00021  *
00022  */
00023 #include "Lgm/Lgm_MagModelInfo.h"
00024 
00025 /*
00026  *
00027  *  User Selectable Parameters:
00028  *                              Info->Kp  (integer value between 0-5 selects the Kp model)
00029  *                              Set this param in the Lgm_MagModelInfo structure before you call routine.
00030  *
00031  *
00032  *  The 36 constant parameters for the 6 T87-long models -- there
00033  *  is one set of 36 for each Kp level. Specifically;
00034  *
00035  *                a[0][] -> Kp =     0, 0+
00036  *                a[1][] -> Kp = 1-, 1, 1+
00037  *                a[2][] -> Kp = 2-, 2, 2+
00038  *                a[3][] -> Kp = 3-, 3, 3+
00039  *                a[4][] -> Kp = 4-, 4, 4+
00040  *                a[5][] -> Kp = >= 5-
00041  *
00042  *  Each line contains the following parameters;
00043  *  {  a1,        a2,       a3,        a4,         a5,        a6, 
00044  *     b1,        b2,       b3,        b4,         b5,        b6, 
00045  *     c1,        c2,       c3,        c4,         c5,        c6, 
00046  *     c7,        c8,       c9,        c10,        B0,        B1, 
00047  *     B2         Brc,      Rrc        xN,         D,         dy, 
00048  *     RH,        dx1,      dx2,       x1,         x2,        RT         },
00049  *
00050  *
00051  *  Note that it is correct that b6 for Kp = 4-, 4, 4+ is positive (there's
00052  *  a typo in the original paper).
00053  *
00054  */
00055 static double Lgm_T87_a[6][36] = {
00056     {  -0.09673,  -10.63,   1.210,     34.57,      -0.04502,  -0.06553,     
00057        -0.02952,  0.3852,   -0.03665,  -2.084,     0.001795,  0.00638, 
00058        -23.49,    0.06082,  0.01642,   -0.02137,   32.21,     -0.04373,     /* Kp =     0, 0+ */
00059        -0.02311,  -0.2832,  -0.002303, -0.000631,  -6.397,    -967.0, 
00060        -8650.0,   -20.55,   5.180,     -2.796,     2.715,     13.58,
00061        8.038,     29.21,    14.605,    4.0,        5.0,       30.0       },
00062     {  -0.48500,  -12.84,   1.856,     40.06,      -0.0294,   -0.09071, 
00063        -0.02993,  0.5465,   -0.04928,  -2.453,     0.001587,  0.007402, 
00064        -29.41,    0.08101,  0.02322,   -0.10910,   40.75,     -0.07995,     /* Kp = 1-, 1, 1+ */
00065        -0.03859,  -0.2755,  -0.002759, -0.000408,  -6.189,    -957.8, 
00066        -7246.0,   -25.51,   5.207,     -4.184,     2.641,     16.56, 
00067        7.795,     29.36,    14.68,     4.0,        5.0,       30.0       },
00068     {  -1.13200,  -18.05,   2.625,     48.55,      -0.004868, -0.10870, 
00069        -0.03824,  0.8514,   -0.05220,  -2.881,     -0.000295, 0.009055, 
00070        -29.48,    0.06394,  0.03864,   -0.22880,   41.77,     -0.05849,     /* Kp = 2-, 2, 2+ */
00071        -0.06443,  -0.4683,  0.001222,  -0.000519,  -3.696,    -991.1, 
00072        -6955.0,   -31.43,   4.878,     -3.151,     3.277,     19.19, 
00073        7.248,     28.99,    14.495,    4.0,        5.0,       30.0       },
00074     {  -1.00300,  -16.98,   3.140,     52.81,      -0.08625,  -0.14780, 
00075        -0.03501,  0.5500,   -0.07778,  -2.970,     0.002086,  0.01275, 
00076        -26.79,    0.06328,  0.03622,   0.08345,    39.72,     -0.06009,     /* Kp = 3-, 3, 3+ */
00077        -0.07825,  -0.9698,  0.000178,  -0.000573,  -0.9328,   -872.5, 
00078        -5851.0,   -39.68,   4.902,     -3.848,     2.790,     20.91, 
00079        6.193,     26.81,    13.405,    4.0,        5.0,       30.0       },
00080     {  -1.53900,  -14.29,   3.479,     53.36,      -0.004201, -0.20430, 
00081        -0.03932,  0.6409,   -0.10580,  -3.221,     -0.00114,  0.02166, 
00082        -30.43,    0.04049,  0.05464,   0.008884,   42.00,     -0.01035,     /* Kp = 4-, 4, 4+ */
00083        -0.10530,  -1.630,   0.003802,  -0.001029,  4.204,     -665.6, 
00084        -1011.0,   -43.49,   4.514,     -2.948,     2.990,     21.59, 
00085        6.005,     22.00,    11.00,     4.0,        5.0,       30.0       },
00086     {  -2.581,    -7.726,   5.045,     53.31,      0.02262,   -0.1972, 
00087        -0.01981,  0.4280,   -0.1055,   -5.075,     0.002762,  0.03277, 
00088        -27.35,    0.04986,  0.06119,   -0.1211,    47.48,     -0.0502,      /* Kp >= 5-      */
00089        -0.1477,   0.838,    -0.01008,  -0.0057,    9.231,     -674.3, 
00090        -900.0,    -74.43,   4.658,     -3.245,     3.39,      21.80, 
00091        5.620,     25.17,    12.585,    4.0,        5.0,       30.0       }
00092 };

00098 /*
00099  *   Routines compute the B1, B2, and B3 terms in the T87 long model.
00100  *   GSM coords are assumed.
00101  */
00102 int Lgm_B1_T87( Lgm_Vector *v, Lgm_Vector *B, Lgm_MagModelInfo *Info ) {
00103 
00104     double      sin_psi, cos_psi, rho, zeta;
00105     double      r2, z2, rr;
00106     Lgm_Vector  v_sm, Bsm;
00107     double      B_rho, B_zeta;
00108     double      *p;
00109 
00110     p = Lgm_T87_a[Info->Kp];
00111 
00112 
00113     sin_psi = Info->c->sin_psi;
00114     cos_psi = Info->c->cos_psi;
00115 
00116     /*
00117      *   Compute the solar-magnetic coordinates (SM)
00118      */
00119     v_sm.x = v->x*cos_psi - v->z*sin_psi;
00120     v_sm.y = v->y;
00121     v_sm.z = v->x*sin_psi + v->z*cos_psi;
00122 
00123 
00124 
00125     /*
00126      *   Compute the cylindrical coords.
00127      */
00128     rho  = sqrt( v_sm.x*v_sm.x + v_sm.y*v_sm.y ) / p[26];
00129     zeta = v_sm.z / p[26];
00130 
00131 
00132 
00133     /*
00134      * Now compute B1(rho, phi, zeta) i.e. in cylindrical coords.
00135      */
00136     r2 = rho*rho;
00137     z2 = zeta*zeta;
00138     rr = 4.0 * p[25] * pow( r2 + z2 + 4.0, -2.5 );
00139     B_rho  = 3.0 * rho * zeta * rr;
00140     B_zeta = (2.0 * z2 - r2 + 8.0) * rr;
00141 
00142 
00143 
00144     /*
00145      *   Now transform B1(rho, phi, zeta) -> B1(x_sm, y_sm, z_sm)
00146      */
00147     if (rho > 0.0){
00148     rr =  B_rho/(rho * p[26]);
00149         Bsm.x = rr * v_sm.x;
00150         Bsm.y = rr * v_sm.y;
00151     }
00152     else{ 
00153         Bsm.x = 0.0;
00154         Bsm.y = 0.0;
00155     }
00156     Bsm.z = B_zeta;
00157 
00158 
00159 
00160     /*
00161      *    Now transform B1(x_sm, y_sm, z_sm) -> B1(x, y, z)
00162      */
00163     B->x =  Bsm.x*cos_psi + Bsm.z*sin_psi;
00164     B->y =  Bsm.y;
00165     B->z = -Bsm.x*sin_psi + Bsm.z*cos_psi;
00166 
00167 
00168     return(1);
00169 
00170 }
00171 
00172 
00173 int Lgm_B2_T87( Lgm_Vector *v, Lgm_Vector *B, Lgm_MagModelInfo *Info ) {
00174 
00175     double     xsi_1, xsi_2, xsi_N;
00176     double     z_r, z_p, z_m;
00177     double     beta, beta_p, beta_m;
00178     double     x22mb2, x22mbp2, x22mbm2, xNmx2tgamma_2, xNmx2tgamma_2p, xNmx2tgamma_2m;
00179     double     xsi_12, xsi_22, xsi_N2, D2, beta2, beta_p2, beta_m2;
00180     double     gamma_22, gamma_2p2, gamma_2m2;
00181     double     xN_m_x1, xN_m_x2, xN_m_x1_2, xN_m_x2_2, x2b, x2bp, x2bm;
00182     double     log_xN_m_x1_2, log_xN_m_x2_2, log_x2b, log_x2bp, log_x2bm;
00183     double     gamma_1, gamma_1p, gamma_1m, gamma_2, gamma_2p, gamma_2m;
00184     double     P_1, P_1p, P_1m, P_2, P_2p, P_2m;
00185     double     S_0, S_0p, S_0m, S_1, S_1p, S_1m, S_2, S_2p, S_2m;
00186     double     G_0, G_1, G_1p, G_1m, G_2, G_2p, G_2m;
00187     double     f;
00188     double    *p;
00189 
00190     p = Lgm_T87_a[Info->Kp];
00191 
00192 
00193     xsi_1  = p[33] - v->x;
00194     xsi_2  = p[34] - v->x;
00195     xsi_N  = p[27] - v->x;
00196     xsi_12 = xsi_1*xsi_1;
00197     xsi_22 = xsi_2*xsi_2;
00198     xsi_N2 = xsi_N*xsi_N;
00199 
00200     z_r = v->z - p[30] * Info->c->sin_psi;
00201     z_p = v->z - p[35];
00202     z_m = v->z + p[35];
00203 
00204 
00205     D2      = p[28]*p[28];
00206     beta2   = z_r*z_r + D2;
00207     beta    = sqrt( beta2 );
00208     beta_p2 = z_p*z_p + D2;
00209     beta_p  = sqrt( beta_p2 );
00210     beta_m2 = z_m*z_m + D2;
00211     beta_m  = sqrt( beta_m2 );
00212 
00213 
00214     gamma_1   = xsi_12 + beta2;
00215     gamma_1p  = xsi_12 + beta_p2;
00216     gamma_1m  = xsi_12 + beta_m2;
00217     gamma_2   = xsi_22 + beta2;
00218     gamma_22  = gamma_2*gamma_2;
00219     gamma_2p  = xsi_22 + beta_p2;
00220     gamma_2p2 = gamma_2p*gamma_2p;
00221     gamma_2m  = xsi_22 + beta_m2;
00222     gamma_2m2 = gamma_2m*gamma_2m;
00223 
00224     xN_m_x1    = p[27] - p[33];
00225     xN_m_x2    = p[27] - p[34];
00226     xN_m_x1_2  = xN_m_x1*xN_m_x1;
00227     xN_m_x2_2  = xN_m_x2*xN_m_x2;
00228     x2b        = xsi_N2 + beta2;
00229     x2bp       = xsi_N2 + beta_p2;
00230     x2bm       = xsi_N2 + beta_m2;
00231 
00232     log_xN_m_x1_2 = log( xN_m_x1_2 );
00233     log_xN_m_x2_2 = log( xN_m_x2_2 );
00234     log_x2b       = log( x2b );
00235     log_x2bp      = log( x2bp );
00236     log_x2bm      = log( x2bm );
00237 
00238     P_1  = 0.5 / gamma_1   * (log_xN_m_x1_2 - log_x2b  );
00239     P_1p = 0.5 / gamma_1p  * (log_xN_m_x1_2 - log_x2bp );
00240     P_1m = 0.5 / gamma_1m  * (log_xN_m_x1_2 - log_x2bm );
00241 
00242     P_2  = 1.0 / gamma_22  * (log_xN_m_x2_2 - log_x2b  );
00243     P_2p = 1.0 / gamma_2p2 * (log_xN_m_x2_2 - log_x2bp );
00244     P_2m = 1.0 / gamma_2m2 * (log_xN_m_x2_2 - log_x2bm );
00245 
00246     S_0  = (M_PI_2 + atan(xsi_N / beta  )) / beta;
00247     S_0p = (M_PI_2 + atan(xsi_N / beta_p)) / beta_p;
00248     S_0m = (M_PI_2 + atan(xsi_N / beta_m)) / beta_m;
00249 
00250     S_1  = P_1  - (xsi_1 / gamma_1 ) * S_0;
00251     S_1p = P_1p - (xsi_1 / gamma_1p) * S_0p;
00252     S_1m = P_1m - (xsi_1 / gamma_1m) * S_0m;
00253 
00254     x22mb2  = xsi_22 - beta2;
00255     x22mbp2 = xsi_22 - beta_p2;
00256     x22mbm2 = xsi_22 - beta_m2;
00257     xNmx2tgamma_2   = xN_m_x2 * gamma_2;
00258     xNmx2tgamma_2p  = xN_m_x2 * gamma_2p;
00259     xNmx2tgamma_2m  = xN_m_x2 * gamma_2m;
00260     S_2  = -xsi_2 * P_2  - 1.0 / xNmx2tgamma_2  + x22mb2  / gamma_22  * S_0;
00261     S_2p = -xsi_2 * P_2p - 1.0 / xNmx2tgamma_2p + x22mbp2 / gamma_2p2 * S_0p;
00262     S_2m = -xsi_2 * P_2m - 1.0 / xNmx2tgamma_2m + x22mbm2 / gamma_2m2 * S_0m;
00263 
00264     G_0  = 0.5 * log_x2b - .25 * ( log_x2bp + log_x2bm );
00265 
00266     G_1  = beta2   * S_0  / gamma_1  + xsi_1 * P_1;
00267     G_1p = beta_p2 * S_0p / gamma_1p + xsi_1 * P_1p;
00268     G_1m = beta_m2 * S_0m / gamma_1m + xsi_1 * P_1m;
00269 
00270     G_2  = -0.5 * x22mb2  * P_2    - 2.0 * beta2   * xsi_2 * S_0 /gamma_22    - xsi_2/xNmx2tgamma_2;
00271     G_2p = -0.5 * x22mbp2 * P_2p   - 2.0 * beta_p2 * xsi_2 * S_0p/gamma_2p2   - xsi_2/xNmx2tgamma_2p;
00272     G_2m = -0.5 * x22mbm2 * P_2m   - 2.0 * beta_m2 * xsi_2 * S_0m/gamma_2m2   - xsi_2/xNmx2tgamma_2m;
00273     
00274     f = 1.0 / (M_PI * (1.0 + (v->y/p[29])*(v->y/p[29])));
00275 
00276 
00277 
00278     /*
00279      *   Compute B2(x, y, z)  i.e. in GSM coords.
00280      */
00281     B->x = f * (p[22] * ( z_r * S_0 - 0.5 * (z_p * S_0p + z_m 
00282         * S_0m)) + p[23] * (z_r * S_1 - 0.5 * (z_p * S_1p 
00283         + z_m * S_1m)) + p[24] * (z_r * S_2 - 0.5 * (z_p 
00284         * S_2p + z_m * S_2m)));
00285     B->y = 0.0;
00286     B->z = f * (p[22] * G_0 + p[23] * (G_1 - 0.5 * (G_1p + G_1m)) 
00287         + p[24] * (G_2 - 0.5 * (G_2p + G_2m)));
00288 
00289     return(1);
00290 
00291 }
00292 
00293 
00294 int Lgm_B3_T87( Lgm_Vector *v, Lgm_Vector *B, Lgm_MagModelInfo *Info ) {
00295 
00296     double  sin_psi, cos_psi, e1, e2, x2, y2, z2, zc;
00297     double  *p;
00298 
00299     p = Lgm_T87_a[Info->Kp];
00300     
00301 
00302     sin_psi = Info->c->sin_psi;
00303     cos_psi = Info->c->cos_psi;
00304     e1      = exp(v->x / p[31]);
00305     e2      = exp(v->x / p[32]);
00306     x2      = v->x * v->x;
00307     y2      = v->y * v->y;
00308     z2      = v->z * v->z;
00309     zc      = v->z * cos_psi;
00310 
00311     B->x = e1 * (p[0]*zc + p[1]*sin_psi)
00312         + e2 * (p[2]*zc + (p[3] + p[4]*y2 + p[5]*z2) * sin_psi);
00313 
00314     B->y = e1 * (p[6]*v->y*zc + p[7]*v->y*sin_psi) 
00315         + e2 * (p[8]*v->y*zc + (p[9]*v->y + p[10]*v->y*y2 + p[11]*v->y*z2) * sin_psi);
00316 
00317     B->z = e1 * ((p[12] + p[13]*y2 + p[14]*z2) * cos_psi + p[15]*v->z*sin_psi) 
00318         + e2 * ((p[16] + p[17]*y2 + p[18]*z2) * cos_psi + (p[19]*v->z + p[20]*v->z*y2 + p[21]*v->z*z2) * sin_psi);
00319 
00320     return(1);
00321 }
00322 
00323 
00324 
00325 int Lgm_B_T87( Lgm_Vector *v, Lgm_Vector *B, Lgm_MagModelInfo *Info ) {
00326 
00327     Lgm_Vector  B1, B2, B3, B4;
00328 
00329     Lgm_B1_T87( v, &B1,  Info );
00330     Lgm_B2_T87( v, &B2,  Info );
00331     Lgm_B3_T87( v, &B3,  Info );
00332 
00333     switch ( Info->InternalModel ){
00334 
00335         case LGM_CDIP:
00336                         Lgm_B_cdip( v, &B4, Info );
00337                         break;
00338         case LGM_EDIP:
00339                         Lgm_B_edip( v, &B4, Info );
00340                         break;
00341         case LGM_IGRF:
00342                         Lgm_B_igrf( v, &B4, Info );
00343                         break;
00344         default:
00345                         fprintf(stderr, "Lgm_B_T87: Unknown internal model (%d)\n", Info->InternalModel );
00346                         break;
00347 
00348     }
00349 
00350     B->x = B1.x + B2.x + B3.x + B4.x;
00351     B->y = B1.y + B2.y + B3.y + B4.y;
00352     B->z = B1.z + B2.z + B3.z + B4.z;
00353 
00354     ++Info->nFunc;
00355 
00356     return(1);
00357 
00358 }
00359 /*
00360  *   $Id: T87.c 1 2010-08-11 20:53:07Z mgh $
00361  */
